description: Jeff Converse is out running the trails when he passes Joe Savage.  When he finishes his run he is sitting on his front porch when Joe runs by.  Jeff invites him to take a break.  After exchanging pleasantries, they decide to exchange blow jobs.  Joe makes it clear to Jeff that he wants to fuck him good, but first Jeff has some work to do.  After Jeff is fucked it's his turn to stick it to Joe.
title: Spring Training, Scene #05
